title: One Piece Episode 337 Recap
author: swim squad
description: A detailed recap of One Piece Episode 337, covering the Straw Hats' entry into the Florian Triangle and their first meeting with Brook. The reviewer particularly praised Ian Sinclair's English voice performance as Brook.

title: One Piece – Thriller Bark Arc (Episodes 337 – 381) Review
author: Hogan Reviews
description: A comprehensive review of the entire Thriller Bark arc spanning episodes 337-381. The reviewer discusses Brook's introduction, the arc's horror-comedy tone, and various plot elements, though they were critical of the arc overall, rating it 2 out of 5 stars.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for the entire Thriller Bark arc through Episode 381
